title: Value of new loans after a deposit

content.question: If a commercial bank has no excess reserves and the reserve requirement is 10 percent, what is the value of new loans this single bank can issue if a new customer deposits $10,000 ?

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
